data.name: Ancient Vanguard
data.detailed_description: Includes the "Ancient Vanguard" outfit that reduces the delay before Lara regenerates her health, the "Guiding Light" Bow skin and a card pack with two guaranteed rare cards and three other cards that have an increased chance at being rare.

pc_requirements.minimum:
